description: We need to be able to override flags that are in different config groups in tests via self.flags(..., group=)
title: tests should be able to override config group

comments.content: We need to be able to override flags that are in different config groups in tests via self.flags(..., group=)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/16222
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/16222
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/0c1fb6a1390b32b1c02c25af5301a0a7631aa52c
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0c1fb6a1390b32b1c02c25af5301a0a7631aa52c
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Nov 15 20:12:52 2012 +0000

    Allow group='foo' in self.flags() for tests.
    
    Cells config options are in a 'cells' config group, and this is needed
    to support the tests.
    
    Fixes bug 1079378
    
    Change-Id: I6b6f2f9f5430b8bab8194a2766fe8075e45d92b1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
